channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @rabbijilljacobs It’s fair to say the world did not radically improve in your absence.
item.source:markdown: @rabbijilljacobs It’s fair to say the world did not radically improve in your absence.

item.description: @michaelharriot @nhannahjones @pewresearch As someone who can trace my family roots back past the mid 19th century only because my grandfather did the work 50 years ago, I’m not surprised that many people can’t.
item.source:markdown: @michaelharriot @nhannahjones @pewresearch As someone who can trace my family roots back past the mid 19th century only because my grandfather did the work 50 years ago, I’m not surprised that many people can’t.

item.description: @typolad Also, worth remembering that the YU musmakh who introduced the phrase “family values” into the Republican lexicon was later revealed to be a sex criminal himself. https://t.co/ujNjcgW7jz
item.source:markdown: @typolad Also, worth remembering that the YU musmakh who introduced the phrase “family values” into the Republican lexicon was later revealed to be a sex criminal himself. https://t.co/ujNjcgW7jz

item.description: @typolad I’m still too furious about their multiple coverups of sex crimes to be worried about their being useful idiots for the re-Christianization of America. https://t.co/nUbHjbUKQ0
item.source:markdown: @typolad I’m still too furious about their multiple coverups of sex crimes to be worried about their being useful idiots for the re-Christianization of America. https://t.co/nUbHjbUKQ0

item.description: @typolad Will have to agree to disagree with you on this one. https://t.co/AkzbgZrBhk
item.source:markdown: @typolad Will have to agree to disagree with you on this one. https://t.co/AkzbgZrBhk

item.description: @KurtBusiek @HeerJeet Only one issue of What If is canon in my book. https://t.co/S07Kd9T3rT
